name: Hydro Flask Wine Tumbler 295ml
description: Yes! We said wine. This tumbler features TempSheild™ double wall insulation that keeps your whites cool and your reds safe from the sun. And since we know what your next question is going to be: it holds two standard pours so you’ve got a glass for you and a glass to share (or not).TempShield™ double wall insulated technology keeps your drinks cold for up to 24 hours, hot for up to 6 hours, and won’t sweat on you.18/8 food grade stainless steel is the benchmark steel of the high-end culinary world.Press-fit lid reduces sloshing and has honeycomb insulation.Cap is dishwasher safe and recyclable PP#5.Dimensions: 7.2 x 21.5 cm.
